Title: Requires the state to enter into an agreement with the Rand Corporation to conduct a study of the impact the 2020 Discovery Reform legislation has had on the handling of criminal cases
Summary: Requires the state to enter into an agreement with the Rand Corporation to conduct a study of the impact of the 2020 Discovery Reform legislation enacted by Part HHH of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020 has had on the handling and disposition of criminal cases; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the state to enter into an agreement with the Rand Corporation to conduct a study of the impact the 2020 Discovery Reform legislation enacted by part HHH of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020 has had on the handling and disposition of criminal cases; and making an appropriation therefor
